short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and display the last 250 Google searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever done a Google search and received amazing results -- but later want to access those same results and can't remember the search you ran?  This is a quick and easy solution.

This extension saves your last 250 Google searches locally. You can access the last 20 searches via the pull-down menu, and by clicking on "See All Searches" in the pulldown menu, you can open the web page with the full 250 last Google searches.  Each search history item listed also has the date and time you accessed it.

This extension does not cause any data about you to be sent anywhere other than local storage on your own computer.
